jQuery Callbacks 源码解读

基本结构


jQuery.Callbacks = function(options) {
    // self.fireWith 以及 self.add中都有调用fire方法
    fire = function() {}
    self = {
        add: function() {}, 
        remove: function() {},
        has: function(fn) {},
        empty: function() {},
        disable: function() {},
        disabled: function() {},
        lock: function() {},
        locked: function() {},
        fireWith: function(context, args) {},
        fire: function() {},
        fired: function() {}
    };
    return self;
};

变量定义


var // Flag to know if list is currently firing
firing,

// Last fire value for non-forgettable lists
memory,

// Flag to know if list was already fired
fired,

// Flag to prevent firing
locked,

// Actual callback list
list = [],

// Queue of execution data for repeatable lists
queue = [],

// Index of currently firing callback (modified by add/remove as needed)
firingIndex = -1,

add 方法


// Add a callback or a collection of callbacks to the list
add: function() {
    // 如果list===""，则返回false
    // disable方法和lock方法都会尝试使list=""，以达到禁用add方法的目的
    if ( list ) {

        // If we have memory from a past run, we should fire after adding
        // TODO：这段代码的真是用途是什么？
        if ( memory && !firing ) {
            firingIndex = list.length - 1;
            queue.push( memory );
        }

        ( function add( args ) {
            jQuery.each( args, function( _, arg ) {
                if ( jQuery.isFunction( arg ) ) {
                    // 回调不唯一或者回调唯一但不存在
                    if ( !options.unique || !self.has( arg ) ) {
                        list.push( arg );
                    }
                } else if ( arg && arg.length && jQuery.type( arg ) !== "string" ) {
                    // arg 如果为数组或对象，则递归调用add
                    // Inspect recursively
                    add( arg );
                }
            } );
        } )( arguments );
        
        // 如果memory被设置了，则在加入回调函数后立即触发该函数
        // 这一特性非常重要，我们会在deferred对象中体会到它的妙处
        if ( memory && !firing ) {
            fire();
        }
    }
    return this;
}

remove 方法


// Remove a callback from the list
// Remove 方法比较简单，遍历参数arguments，判断每个函数是否存在于list列表中，
// 如果存在，则通过splice()函数删除，如果有必要还要更新firingIndex
remove: function() {
    jQuery.each( arguments, function( _, arg ) {
        var index;
        while ( ( index = jQuery.inArray( arg, list, index ) ) > -1 ) {
            list.splice( index, 1 );

            // Handle firing indexes
            if ( index <= firingIndex ) {
                firingIndex--;
            }
        }
    } );
    return this;
}

jQuery的inArray()方法


inArray: function( elem, arr, i ) {
    return arr == null ? -1 : indexOf.call( arr, elem, i );
}

has 方法


// Check if a given callback is in the list.
// If no argument is given, return whether or not list has callbacks attached.
// 判断回调函数是否已经存在于回调列表中
has: function( fn ) {
    return fn ?
        jQuery.inArray( fn, list ) > -1 :
        list.length > 0;
}

empty 方法


// Remove all callbacks from the list
// 清空回调列表
empty: function() {
    if ( list ) {
        list = [];
    }
    return this;
}

disable & disabled VS disable方法


// Disable .fire and .add
// Abort any current/pending executions
// Clear all callbacks and values
disable: function() {
    locked = queue = [];
    list = memory = ""; // 清空list，并起到禁用add方法的目的
    return this;
}
disabled: function() {
    // 如果list=[],则返回false，如果list=""，则返回true
    return !list;
}

// Disable .fire
// Also disable .add unless we have memory (since it would have no effect)
// Abort any pending executions
lock: function() {
    locked = queue = [];
    if ( !memory ) {
    // 如果不存在memory，则清空list和memory，并禁用add方法
    // 注意与disable()方法的区别：disable()不会关心memory这个参数，不管三七二十一就禁用掉了add()方法，
    // 而lock()方法只在memory参数不存在（也可能是memory=""|null|undefined）时才会禁用add()方法
    // 显然，disable()方法更加残忍直接
        list = memory = "";
    }
    return this;
},
locked: function() {
    return !!locked;
}

self.fireWith & self.fire & self.fired 方法


// Call all callbacks with the given context and arguments
fireWith: function( context, args ) {
    // 没有被锁住
    if ( !locked ) {
        args = args || [];
        args = [ context, args.slice ? args.slice() : args ];
        queue.push( args );
        if ( !firing ) {
            fire();
        }
    }
    return this;
},

// Call all the callbacks with the given arguments
fire: function() {
    self.fireWith( this, arguments );
    return this;
},

// To know if the callbacks have already been called at least once
fired: function() {
    return !!fired;
}

fire 方法


// Fire callbacks
fire = function() {

    // Enforce single-firing
    locked = options.once;

    // Execute callbacks for all pending executions,
    // respecting firingIndex overrides and runtime changes
    fired = firing = true;
    for ( ; queue.length; firingIndex = -1 ) {
        memory = queue.shift();
        while ( ++firingIndex < list.length ) {

            // Run callback and check for early termination
            if ( list[ firingIndex ].apply( memory[ 0 ], memory[ 1 ] ) === false &&
                options.stopOnFalse ) {

                // Jump to end and forget the data so .add doesn't re-fire
                firingIndex = list.length;
                memory = false;
            }
        }
    }

    // Forget the data if we're done with it
    if ( !options.memory ) {
        memory = false;
    }

    firing = false;

    // Clean up if we're done firing for good
    if ( locked ) {

        // Keep an empty list if we have data for future add calls
        if ( memory ) {
            list = [];

        // Otherwise, this object is spent
        } else {
            list = "";
        }
    }
}

例子1


function fn1(value) {
    console.log('fn1 says: ' + value);
}
function fn2(value) {
    console.log('fn2 says: ' + value);
}
var callbacks = $.Callbacks();
callbacks.add(fn1);

// fn1 says: foo
callbacks.fire('foo'); 
callbacks.add(fn2);

// fn1 says: bar 
// fn2 says: bar
callbacks.fire('bar');

例子2 once


function fn1(value) {
    console.log('fn1 says: ' + value);
}
function fn2(value) {
    console.log('fn2 says: ' + value);
}

// Callbacks传递了once
var callbacks = $.Callbacks('once');
callbacks.add(fn1);

// fn1 says: foo
callbacks.fire('foo');

// 无法再添加任何回调函数。
// 第一次调用fire后，callbacks的回调列表被强制转成一个空字符串，再调用add方法将不执行任何操作
callbacks.add(fn2);

// 由于callbacks的回调列表变成了一个空字符串，所以没有输出 
callbacks.fire('bar');

例子3 memory


function fn1(value) {
    console.log('fn1 says: ' + value);
}
function fn2(value) {
    console.log('fn2 says: ' + value);
}

// Callbacks传递了memory
var callbacks = $.Callbacks('memory'); // 也可以这样使用： $.Callbacks({"memory":true})
callbacks.add(fn1);

// fn1 says: foo
callbacks.fire('foo');

// fn2 says: foo
callbacks.add(fn2);
// 由于有memory标志，在添加fn2后马上执行了fn2

// fn1 says: bar
// fn2 says: bar 
callbacks.fire('bar');

例子4 once & memory


function fn1(value) {
    console.log('fn1 says: ' + value);
}
function fn2(value) {
    console.log('fn2 says: ' + value);
}
function fn3(value) {
    console.log('fn3 says: ' + value);
}

// Callbacks传递了once和memory
var callbacks = $.Callbacks('once memory'); 
callbacks.add(fn1);

// fn1 says: foo
callbacks.fire('foo');

// fn2 says: foo
callbacks.add(fn2);
// 由于有memory标志，在添加fn2后马上执行了fn2

// 由于有once标志，执行完一次fire后，locked=true
// 直接调用callbacks的对象函数fire将不起任何作用（吐槽下jQuery，为什么两个fire名字相同，这样都不太好区分）
callbacks.fire('bar'); 

// fn3 says: foo
callbacks.add(fn3);
// 由于有memory标志，在添加fn3后马上执行了fn3
